changescene.exists_error: The specified scene does not exist.

coop.description: Forces someone to join the world of others

godmode.description: Prevents you from taking damage. Defaults to toggle.

heal.description: Heal all characters in your current team.

kick.description: Kicks the specified player from the server (WIP)

language.language_not_found: currently, server does not have that language: %s

permission.description: Grants or removes a permission for a user

resetConst.success: Constellations for %s have been reset. Please relog to see changes.
resetConst.description: Resets the constellation level on your current active character, will need to relog after using the command to see any changes.

resetShopLimit.description: Reset target player's shop refresh time.

sendMail.user_not_exist: The user with an id of '%s' does not exist
sendMail.start_composition:
Starting composition of message.
Please use `/sendmail <title>` to continue.
You can use `/sendmail stop` at any time
sendMail.not_composition_end:
Message composition not at final stage.
Please use `/sendmail %s` or `/sendmail stop` to cancel
sendMail.set_title:
Message title set as '%s'.
Use '/sendmail <content>' to continue.
sendMail.set_contents:
Message contents set as '%s'.
Use '/sendmail <sender>' to continue.
sendMail.set_message_sender:
Message sender set as '%s'.
Use '/sendmail <itemId|itemName|finish> [amount] [level]' to continue.
sendMail.send:
Attached %s of %s (level %s) to the message.
Continue adding more items or use `/sendmail finish` to send the message.
sendMail.title: <title>
sendMail.error: ERROR: invalid construction stage %s. Check console for stacktrace.
sendMail.description: Sends mail to the specified user. The usage of this command changes based on it's composition state.

sendMessage.description: Sends a message to a player as the server

	(cont.) Elemental RES: respyro | rescryo | reshydro | resgeo | resdendro | reselectro | resphys
setStats.description: Set fight property for your current active character

setWorldLevel.description: Sets your world level (Relog to see proper effects)
